product_details.name: Redragon K673 PRO 75% Wireless Gasket RGB Gaming Keyboard, 3-Modes 81 Keys Compact Mechanical Keyboard Hot-Swap Socket, Dedicated Knob Control and Sound Absorbing Pads, Linear Red Switch
product_details.description: Brand: Redragon. Hardware Platform: Gaming Console, PC. Operating System: Win. Item Weight: 1.1 pounds. Product Dimensions: 13.78 x 1.34 x 5.12 inches. Item Dimensions Lx Wx H: 13.78 x 1.34 x 5.12 inches. Color: Abyssal Blue. Batteries: 1 Lithium Polymer batteries required. (included). Country of Origin: China.

banner_details:
The banner design features a sleek and modern layout to promote a wireless RGB gaming keyboard. It uses a dark-themed background with dynamic curved shapes and translucent circles to create visual depth. The banner centers a product image of a mechanical keyboard (id: `product_image`) with RGB lighting, establishing the focus. The large, bold heading text (id: `heading`) sits near the top for brand recognition, paired with a vibrant subheading (id: `subheading`) in cyan to highlight the product type. Supporting features are summarized in a description text (id: `description`), followed by a high-contrast price tag (id: `price`) in bold pink. A rectangular call-to-action button (ids: `cta_background`, `cta`) in cyan-blue concludes the composition visually and functionally. Decorative colored vertical bars frame the top and bottom, enhancing the RGB theme.

**Color Palette**:
- Background Black: `#121212`
- Accent Cyan: `#33CCFF`
- Hot Pink: `#FF3366`
- Lime Green: `#66FF99`
- Bright Yellow: `#FFCC33`
- Lavender: `#CC99FF`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image features a mechanical keyboard with a bold and vibrant color palette ideal for a gaming or tech-themed advertisement banner. Primary colors include matte black (#1C1E22), soft white (#F2F3F4), and neon accent tones like yellow (#FFD700), green (#00FF96), cyan (#00E5FF), and electric blue (#1E90FF). The left-hand keys use warm yellow-orange legends for emphasis, while the right side leans into cool tones with blue and cyan legends. The base tones are effectively contrasted by RGB underglow lighting that blends smoothly under the keys, creating a glowing, futuristic aesthetic. These colors balance well, enhancing both visibility and modern appeal.
